sort.description: Sorts the main `pl.DataFrame` object in-place according to the specified column.

col.description: Name of the column to sort by.

exclude.description: Deletes all rows from the main `pl.DataFrame` object         where the specified column has the specified value.

col.description: Name of the column to check for the specified value.

append.description: Append a row to the dataframe

val.description: values to append to the dataframe

mappend.description: Append many rows to the dataframe

val.description: values to append to the dataframe

diffm.description: Add a difference column to the main dataframe: calculate the

diffcol.description: The column name for which to calculate the difference.

name.description: The name of the resulting difference column. Defaults to "diff".

decimals.description: The number of decimal places to round the difference to. Defaults to 0.
